name: Right Click Plus Save
description:
Welcome to Right Click Plus Save, a quick little minigame based around right clicking and pressing Save Image As...

Your objective is to collect as many of these pictures as possible. With harder difficulty comes moving images, advertisements and potentially malware trying to slow you down.

Each pictures you downloaded has a "price" attached to it. Collect more to get more money, then use them in the Online Shop for different cosmetics! (Generated from the Space Background Generator tool by Deep-Fold). Some of them might even have a rarity attached to them that can increase your total gain!

(though to be honest I don't know why they have rarities, you know, they're images, they'll be the same once I downloaded them.) HOW TO PLAY:
  • Start by double-clicking "Play" and pick a difficulty
  • Right-click on a picture, then click "Save Image As..." to save the picture.
  • Pop-Ups can be disabled by following the instruction.
  • Get 60% or higher on a lower difficulty to unlock the next difficulty.
  • To pause during a game, press Esc. To quit prematurely, press X while paused.

This is my first ever published game, any feedbacks are really appreciated!
